name: Sylvans

notes: Not the best built probably, but somehow it got me from leg 1 to kog quite easy. I feel that for this deck, itâ€™s ok if it exceeds the 20 cards. Especially to avoid merchant betray! Thinking about adding a second carrot as well as a second oak, maybe cutting hermitree and trunade. Still a long way to go to find the most optimal/most consistent variant.
